titles.title: STOP Fentanyl Deaths Act of 2018
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct programs to address the usage of illicit drugs, particularly fentanyl, and for other purposes.
STOP Fentanyl Deaths Act of 2018
Surveillance and Testing of Opioids to Prevent Fentanyl Deaths Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

bill.summary:
Surveillance and Testing of Opioids to Prevent Fentanyl Deaths Act of 2018 or the STOP Fentanyl Deaths Act of 2018
This bill establishes and expands programs to support increased detection and monitoring of fentanyl and other synthetic opioids.
